creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Takako and Victor Hauge
description: black woolen coat with three white embroidered motifs featuring a circular arrangement of overlapping squares forming 6-pointed star at center; blue woolen breastplate with white motif and black lining; black breastplate with white embroidered motif and blue lining
markings: fabric tag on blue tie: [H452] and Japanese writing
medium: Black light wool with white embroidery
title: Noh Costume
